Founded in 2007, Brightlink AV LTD, formerly BrightLink Cables, began as a humble Ebay store that sold just six different kinds of audio/video cables. Since then, it's grown into a company with hundreds of products, warehouses in three different countries, and customers from all over the world.

 BrightLink specializes in providing high-quality Video Distribution & Display Equipment such as HDMI Matrix Switcher Systems, HDBaseT Matrix Switcher Systems, Video Wall Controllers, Video wall Sets, Video Wall No Bezel LCD Displays, LED Video Walls, HDMI Extenders, HDBaseT Extenders, HDMI over IP, HDMI over Fiber, Switches, Splitters, and much more. 


Our equipment is used in almost all industries including Casinos, Sports Bars,  Hospitals, Personal Home Theatres, Super Markets, Shopping Malls, Churches, Data Control Centre, Conference Rooms, Education and Training, Trade Shows, Restaurant Display boards, and anywhere else you would find a multiple HDTV display set up.

We take special pride in helping our trusted installers and "do-it-yourselfers" to obtain the quality products they need at a reasonable price with support through out your installation. 

We offer a 2-year warranty and Fast Free2-3 shipping on almost every in-stock item sold so you know that you're getting excellent products shipped quickly to you door when you shop with BrightLink.

 We have experienced technicians on staff to answer questions about each and every product. They can be reached through 3 or by calling our toll-free number at 1-855-449-4733.

 With our U.S. warehouses located in various strategic locations and our Shenzhen warehouses using Express Air shipping, we can ship most products to anywhere in the United States within 4-8 business days using express tracked services.

 Whether you are looking for the latest HDBaseT / HDMI matrix, HDMI Extenders over Cat6, or multi Screen Video Wall,  BrightLink has what you need to build your dream audio/video system!
